markdownRemark.html: I’m a software developer from Córdoba, Argentina. I’ve worked in different projects using several technologies (web, mobile and some infrastructure as well). I’m curious and I definitely love learning innovative technologies. If there’s something I don’t know, I will learn it. I believe I’m also reliable, communicative, and play well in a team, helping other collaborators when they need it.

frontmatter.title: JS guide for Java developers: Part 1 — scope, closures, global context, this, and undefined
